{{Description|A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.}}
'''Signature Mix''' is [[Diona]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|Skill DMG|2.5|3|Continuous Field DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|ascension|2|Drunkards' Farce|character=Diona|talent=Signature Mix}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|A Lingering Flavor}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|A—Another Round?}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Wine Industry Slayer}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Cat's Tail Closing Time|buffs characters within the radius of Signature Mix as follows:}}
** Characters at or below 50% HP have their Incoming Healing Bonus increased by 30%.
** Characters above 50% HP have their [[Elemental Mastery]] increased by 200.
